title: Hands-free Coding
example_prompt: I'd like to speak instead of typing

extensions.name: Speech
extensions.installation_notes: [PortAudio](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/python-docs-samples/blob/main/scripts/readme-gen/templates/install_portaudio.tmpl.rst#install-portaudio) is required for PyAudio to capture audio from your microphone
